long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform how you consume content with Vocalize, the easy-to-use text-to-speech extension for Chrome. Whether you're reading articles, studying, or just want to give your eyes a break, Vocalize seamlessly converts any webpage text into clear, natural-sounding speech. Now, you can listen to your favorite content while multitasking or relaxing.

Key Features:

📖 Read Aloud: Simply select any text on a webpage, and Vocalize will instantly start reading it out loud to you.
🎧 Enhance Productivity: Multitask effortlessly while listening to articles, emails, reports, and more. Perfect for those on the go.
🌐 Universal Compatibility: Works on any website, ensuring that no matter where you are, your content can be read aloud.
🧑‍🦽 Accessibility Boost: Makes the web more accessible for those with visual impairments or reading difficulties.
🔊 Voice Customization: Choose from a range of voices and adjust the pitch, rate, and volume to your preference for the best listening experience.
⏯️ Control Playback: Play, pause, or stop speech whenever you want with simple controls, giving you complete flexibility.
⚙️ Start Speaking on App Launch: Automatically start reading aloud your selected text as soon as the extension opens for a hands-free experience.
Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who loves listening over reading. Whether you're studying, relaxing, or just need a break from screens, Vocalize will simplify your web experience and bring content to life!

We value your input! If you have any feature requests or suggestions, please reach out via the email provided.
